name: AdultPress
short_description:
Feature rich and powerful, AdultPress will transform the way webmasters maintain their content. There is not one solution offered in the industry that provides all features needed without limitations, hours of research has been implemented by the AdultPress developers to find what features and capabilities webmasters expect from the "perfect" CMS.

The consensus is that webmasters feel frustrated that all solutions they have tried offer features that another CMS doesn't have, but then on the other hand it does not have features that another CMS may. There is a large demand for a "complete" content management system that provides all of the features of current industry related content management system and then some.
summary: An official fork that is geared towards the Adult Industy.
